summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on creating affordable, innovative products like smartphones and IoT devices. With a mission to provide technology for a better life globally, Xiaomi emphasizes three principles: technology-driven, cost-effective, and cool products. Their future strategies include redefining entrepreneurship, integrating internet with manufacturing, and ensuring steady progress. Xiaomi aims to inspire innovation, shape smart living, boost Chinese manufacturing, and impact lives worldwide in the next decade. They aspire to be a beacon for engineers and a leader in future lifestyles, manufacturing, and global progress.
